methods.description: Gets a city name standard for US and international cities

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Your Interzoid license API key. Register at www.interzoid.com/register

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City name from which to retrieve the standardized version

apiDescription: This API provides a standard for US and international cities for the purposes of standardizing city name data, improving query results, analytics, and data merging.
